video.title: Southcliffe
video.synopsis: A journalist returns to the small town of his childhood to cover the story of a mass shooting while grieving residents cope with the tragedy's shock.

episodes.synopsis: After a shooting spree in the village of Southcliffe, native son David Whitehead, an internationally renowned reporter, returns in search of answers.
episodes.title: The Hollow Shore

episodes.synopsis: As the people of Southcliffe try to comprehend their losses, David reflects on growing up in the town and the fact that he knew killer Stephen Morton.
episodes.title: Light Falls

episodes.synopsis: While the families of those killed in Morton's shooting rampage struggle to cope, David tries to keep his emotions in check.
episodes.title: Sorrow's Child

episodes.synopsis: A year after the Southcliffe murders, David is drawn back into the event by an anonymous letter claiming that shooter Stephen Morton is still alive.
episodes.title: All Souls
